info.title: Nexigon Hub API
info.description:
Welcome to the Nexigon Hub API documentation!

Nexigon Hub offers an RPC-style HTTP API.

post.description: Query the users of the instance.
Get information about a user.
Create a new user.
Delete a user.
Set the display name of a user.
Set the password of a user.
Set whether the user is an instance administrator.

Reset the password of a user.

This will send an email to the user with a link to reset their password.
Complete the password reset of a user.
Query the tokens of a user.
Query the organizations of a user.
Query the organization invitations of a user.
Query the sessions of a user.
Authenticate a user with a token.
Authenticate a user with a session token.
Check the permissions of a user for a given device.
Create a user token.
Delete a user token.
Initiate a user session.
Terminate a user session.
Cleanup expired user sessions.
Register a new user with an email and password.
Complete the registration of a user.
Accept a organization invitation.
Query the organizations of the instance.
Query the members of an organization.
Query the projects of an organization.
Query the repositories of an organization.
Query the invitations of an organization.
Create an organization.
Delete an organization.
Add a user to an organization.
Remove a user from an organization.
Set whether the user is an administrator of the organization.
Invite a user to an organization.
Delete an invitation to an organization.
Query the audit log of an organization.
Query the projects of the instance.
Get information about a project.
Create a new project.
Delete a project.
Query the devices of a project.
Query the deployment tokens of a project.
Query repositories of a project.
Set the name of a project.
Create a deployment token.
Delete a deployment token.
Set the flags of a deployment token.
Query the audit log of the project.
Add a repository to the project.
Remove a repository from the project.
Query the devices of the instance.
Get information about a device.
Create a new device.
Delete a device.
Set the name of a device.

Issue a JWT for a device with user-defined claims.

**Note: Only use this action for integration with external systems.**

Validate a device JWT.

**Note: Only use this action for integration with external systems.**

Authenticate a device.

**Note: The certificate fingerprint must be externally verified (mutual TLS).**
Add a device certificate.
Delete a device certificate.
Set the status of a device certificate.
Register a connection of a device to a cluster node.
Unregister a connection of a device to a cluster node.
Query the connection history of a device.
Issue a HTTP proxy JWT.
Validate a HTTP proxy JWT.
Publish device events.
Query device events.
Set a property of a device.
Get a property of a device.
Remove a property from a device.
Query the properties of a device.
Resolve a repository by its name.
Get information about a repository.
Create a new repository.
Delete a repository.
Set the visibility of a repository.
Set the display name of a repository.

Set the public name of a repository.

Note: Setting the public name requires the `public_repositories` subscription feature.
Query the packages of a repository.
Query the assets of a repository.
Query repository projects.
Resolve a package by its path.
Get information about a package.
Create a new package.
Delete a package.
Set the name of a package.
Query the versions of a package.
Resolve a package version by its path.
Get information about a package version.
Create a new package version.
Delete a package version.
Set the name of a package version.
Add an assert to a package version.
Remove an asset from a package version.
Add tags to a version.
Remove tags from a version.
Resolve a version asset by its path.
Set the S3 configuration for the repository.
Get the S3 configuration for the repository.
Get information about an asset.
Create an asset.
Delete an asset.
Issue a URL for downloading an asset.
Issue a URL for uploading an asset.
Query the audit log of the repository.

Query the events recorded in the audit log.

Requires administrator permissions.

Query the actions recorded in the audit log.

Requires administrator permissions.
Query the jobs of the instance.
Get instance statistics.
Get the settings of the instance.
Set a setting of the instance.
Get information about the cluster.
Register a new cluster node.
Report the heartbeat of a cluster node.
Cleanup inactive cluster nodes.

Get the actor.

This action is used to get the actor that is used to invoke the action.

nexigon_api.actor.Actor.description: Actor that may invoke actions in the system.

nexigon_api.actor.AnonymousActor.description: Anonymous actor, typically used for unauthenticated actions.

nexigon_api.actor.DeviceActor.description: Device authenticated via a specific deployment token.

nexigon_api.actor.SystemActor.description: System actor, typically used for internal actions.

nexigon_api.actor.UserActor.description: User authenticated via a user session.

nexigon_api.actor.UserTokenActor.description: User authenticated via a specific token.

nexigon_api.audit.AuditLogAction.description:
Action recorded in the audit log.

Audit data is guaranteed to not contain any secret information.

nexigon_api.audit.AuditLogActionId.description: Unique ID of an audit log action.

nexigon_api.audit.AuditLogActionStatus.description: Status associated with an audit log action.

nexigon_api.audit.AuditLogEvent.description:
Event recorded in the audit log.

Audit data is guaranteed to not contain any secret information.

nexigon_api.audit.AuditLogEventId.description: Unique ID of an audit log event.

nexigon_api.audit.QueryAuditLogActionsOu.description: Output of querying the actions recorded in the audit log.

nexigon_api.audit.QueryAuditLogEventsOut.description: Output of querying the events recorded in the audit log.

nexigon_api.cluster.ClusterNodeId.description: Unique ID of a cluster node.

nexigon_api.cluster.ClusterNodeTerminati.description: Reason why a cluster node was terminated.

nexigon_api.cluster.RegisterClusterNodeO.description: Output of registering a new cluster node.

nexigon_api.datetime.DateSpan.description:
Date span with start and end dates.

**The end date itself is not included in the span.**

nexigon_api.datetime.Timestamp.description: ISO 8601 formatted date and time string.

nexigon_api.devices.AddDeviceCertificate.description: Output of adding a device certificate.

nexigon_api.devices.ConnectionEndReason.description: Reason why a device connection ended.

nexigon_api.devices.CreateDeviceOutput.description: Output of creating a new device.

nexigon_api.devices.DeviceCertificateId.description: Unique ID of a device certificate.

nexigon_api.devices.DeviceConnectionId.description: Unique ID of a device connection.

nexigon_api.devices.DeviceConnectionLog.description: Device connection log entry (for connection history).

nexigon_api.devices.DeviceEventId.description: ID of a device event (unique per device).

nexigon_api.devices.GetDeviceDetailsOutp.description: Output of getting information about a device.

nexigon_api.devices.GetDevicePropertyOut.description: Output of getting a property of a device.

nexigon_api.devices.IssueDeviceHttpProxy.description: Output of issuing a HTTP proxy JWT.

nexigon_api.devices.IssueDeviceTokenOutp.description: Output of issuing a JWT for a device.

nexigon_api.devices.QueryDevicePropertie.description: Output of querying the properties of a device.

nexigon_api.devices.QueryDevicesOutput.description: Output of querying the devices of the instance.

nexigon_api.devices.RegisterDeviceConnec.description: Output of registering a connection of a device to a cluster node.

nexigon_api.devices.RemoveDeviceProperty.description: Output of removing a property from a device.

nexigon_api.devices.ValidateDeviceHttpPr.description: Validation of a HTTP proxy JWT failed.
Output of validating a HTTP proxy JWT.
Successful validation of a HTTP proxy JWT.

nexigon_api.devices.ValidateDeviceTokenO.description: Output of validating a device JWT.

nexigon_api.devices.ValidateDeviceTokenS.description: Successful validation of a device JWT.

nexigon_api.jobs.QueryJobsOutput.description: Output of querying the jobs of the instance.

nexigon_api.organizations.InviteOrganiza.description: Output of inviting a user to an organization.

nexigon_api.organizations.OrganizationIn.description: Unique ID of an invitation to an organization.

nexigon_api.organizations.QueryOrganizat.description: Output of querying the audit log of an organization.
Output of querying the invitations of an organization.
Output of querying the members of an organization.
Output of querying the projects of an organization.

Output of querying the organizations of the instance.

Package version creation has been successful.

Output of getting the S3 configuration for the repository.

This intentionally does not include the secret access key.
